title: cpe2stix Enrichment Property Extension
description: This extension extends Indicator SDOs to support cpe2stix enrichments.

cpe2stix-enrichment-extension.description: The set of properties define the vulnerable CPEs in the pattern property.

all_cpe23uris.description: Specifies all the CPE 2.3 URI’s referenced in the parent STIX Indicator SDO’s pattern property. Example: cpe:2.3:o:ruijie:rg-uac_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*

all_cpe23uris_refs.description: Specifies all the cpe2stix STIX SCO’s (Software) for each CPE 2.3 URI referenced in the parent STIX Indicator SDO’s pattern property. Example: software--65aacb87-0921-4f49-9bc6-f9943bf38d5e

vulnerable_cpe23uris.description: Specifies all the CPE 2.3 URI’s references in the parent STIX Indicator SDO’s pattern property that are vulnerable. Example: cpe:2.3:o:ruijie:rg-uac_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*

vulnerable_cpe23uris_refs.description: Specifies the cpe2stix STIX SCO’s (Software) for each CPE 2.3 URI referenced in the parent STIX Indicator SDO’s pattern property that are vulnerable. Example: software--65aacb87-0921-4f49-9bc6-f9943bf38d5e
